comment.author: 92943860@N00
comment._content: This breed of cattle is aZebu -a bull here naturally. Zebu cattle are well suited to the conditions of east Africa: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zebu

comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: A zebu cow, probably being displayed to Sir Hugh Dow, Chairman of the East African Royal Ccommission on Land and Population, 1953/54, as in the photograph No. CO 1069-129-21.
